alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 2:19PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tom Green County through 245 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Angelo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Veribest, Orient, O.c. Fisher Reservoir, Lake Nasworthy, Goodfellow Air Force Base and Harriet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
